name: Band External Shoulder Rotation
description: Targets the rotator cuff muscles for improved shoulder stability.

name: Band Internal Shoulder Rotation
description: Engages the internal rotator muscles to enhance shoulder strength and mobility.

name: Band Pull-Apart
description: Strengthens the rear deltoids and upper back muscles.

name: Barbell Front Raise
description: Primarily targets the front deltoid muscles to build shoulder size.

name: Barbell Rear Delt Row
description: Focuses on rear deltoids and upper back for improved posture and strength.

name: Barbell Upright Row
description: Works the shoulders and traps for shoulder development.

name: Behind the Neck Press
description: Targets all three heads of the deltoid muscle for complete shoulder engagement.

name: Cable Lateral Raise
description: Isolates the lateral deltoid to widen and strengthen the shoulders.

name: Cable Rear Delt Row
description: Activates the rear deltoids and upper back muscles.

name: Dumbbell Front Raise
description: Emphasizes the front deltoid for shoulder strength and definition.

name: Dumbbell Horizontal Internal Shoulder Rotation
description: Targets internal rotator muscles to build shoulder stability.

name: Dumbbell Horizontal External Shoulder Rotation
description: Strengthens the external rotator muscles for better shoulder control.

name: Dumbbell Lateral Raise
description: Engages the lateral deltoids to build shoulder width and definition.

name: Dumbbell Rear Delt Row
description: Activates the rear deltoids and back muscles to improve upper body posture.

name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
description: Targets the shoulder muscles for overall size and strength.

name: Face Pull
description: Improves shoulder health by targeting the rear delts and upper back.

name: Front Hold
description: Focuses on endurance in the front deltoids for static shoulder strength.

name: Lying Dumbbell External Shoulder Rotation
description: Enhances shoulder stability by targeting external rotator muscles.

name: Lying Dumbbell Internal Shoulder Rotation
description: Targets internal rotator muscles to build shoulder stability.

name: Machine Lateral Raise
description: Isolates the lateral deltoids to increase shoulder width.

name: Machine Shoulder Press
description: Targets the shoulders and triceps for strength and mass.

name: Monkey Row
description: Hits the rear delts and upper back for improved posture.

name: Overhead Press (Dumbbell)
description: Develops shoulder mass and strength with overhead pressing motion.

name: Kettlebell Front Raise
description: Targets the front delts to build strength and definition.

name: Power Jerk
description: A full-body movement that primarily targets the shoulders and helps build explosive power.

name: Push Press
description: Engages shoulders, triceps, and core with a dynamic push to lift the weight overhead.

name: Reverse Cable Flyes
description: Targets the rear deltoids and upper back muscles to improve shoulder stability.

name: Reverse Dumbbell Flyes
description: Strengthens the rear deltoids and upper back, enhancing posture and shoulder support.

name: Reverse Machine Fly
description: Isolates the rear deltoids for improved shoulder and upper back strength.

name: Seated Dumbbell Shoulder Press
description: Builds shoulder and triceps strength through controlled overhead pressing.

name: Seated Barbell Overhead Press
description: Focuses on shoulder muscle development with added core stability due to the barbell's weight.

name: Seated Smith Machine Shoulder Press
description: Provides controlled overhead pressing to target the shoulders without needing balance.

name: Snatch Grip Behind the Neck Press
description: Works the shoulders and traps, emphasizing flexibility and mobility in the shoulders.

name: Arnold Press
description: A variation of the shoulder press that activates all three heads of the deltoid muscles.

name: Shoulder Taps
description: A bodyweight exercise that engages the shoulders, core, and stabilizers for balance.

name: Upright Row (Cable)
description: Targets the deltoids and traps to enhance shoulder strength and stability.

name: Upright Row (Dumbbell)
description: Strengthens the shoulders and traps while offering more range of motion with dumbbells.

name: Single Arm Lateral Raise (Cable)
description: Isolates the lateral deltoid for shoulder width and definition with continuous tension.

name: Overhead Press (Barbell)
description: Builds overall shoulder strength, also involving the triceps and upper chest.

name: Overhead Press (Smith Machine)
description: Focuses on shoulder development with guided bar movement for safety and control.

name: Cable Front Raise
description: Engages the front deltoids with consistent tension from the cable machine.

name: Chest Supported Y Raise
description: Strengthens the shoulder stabilizers and upper back muscles for improved posture.

name: Front Raise (Band)
description: Works the anterior deltoid with resistance from a band, enhancing shoulder mobility.

name: Plate Front Raise
description: Targets the front deltoids by raising a weighted plate for shoulder strength.

name: Seated Dumbbell Lateral Raise
description: Focuses on the lateral deltoids to build shoulder width and definition.

name: Handstand Push-Up
description: A bodyweight exercise that builds shoulder and triceps strength by pressing the body upward while in a handstand position.

name: Pike Push-Up
description: An effective bodyweight exercise that targets the shoulders by mimicking a vertical press in a pike position.

name: Landmine Press
description: A compound exercise that works the shoulders and triceps by pressing a barbell anchored on one end.

name: Bradford Press
description: Combines the front and behind the neck press to engage all heads of the deltoid muscle.

name: Scaption Raise
description: Raises dumbbells in the scapular plane to target the shoulder stabilizers and reduce impingement.

name: Around the World (Plate)
description: Rotates a weight plate around the head to engage all shoulder muscles and improve mobility.

name: Lateral Raise (Band)
description: Performs lateral raises using a resistance band for continuous tension on the deltoids.

name: Cuban Press
description: Combines an upright row with an external rotation and press to work the entire shoulder complex.

name: Wall Slides
description: Improves shoulder mobility and strengthens the stabilizer muscles by sliding the arms up and down a wall.

name: Reverse Fly (Band)
description: Targets the rear deltoids using a resistance band to strengthen the upper back and improve posture.
